title: My Pixel 4 XL is very sluggish / slow. It doesn't matter if I'm on Wi-Fi or data. Any suggestions?
content:
The past couple of months at least my phone which is a Pixel 4 XL has been very sluggish / slow. It doesn't matter if it's via Wi-Fi or data. I often have to switch over to safe mode in order to access some websites because it just doesn't load.
I don't know how to figure out which app can be causing it I read that's probably what the issue is. I don't know if doing a factory reset will help it all. I kind of hate to do that but will if I must. Any suggestions would be appreciated. Does anyone else noticing this issue? Thank you in advance.
